channel.title: Small Cutscenes preview - [video] - last preview before i work on it
channel.description:
Hallo pplz,
I've recently been working on some shitty cutscene thingy majigy.
This isn't 100% myn as i owe a frew pplz credits :
Dd JRealm LeScape M,i,k,e_ and a few other people.
And the server base of course.
Heres the video of it :
http://youtube.com/watch?v=bykFIdyn0PM
And a better quality video :
http://youtube.com/watch?v=bykFIdyn0PM&fmt=18
I don't expect anybody to like this,
I'm just showing the people what me and a few other people in the credits have done so far. I havn't added any npc's or anything like dialogue yet because i'm busy.

item.title: Small Cutscenes preview - [video] - last preview before i work on it
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

oh wow i did this about…a year ago

public void frame177(int i1, int i2, int i3, int i4, int i5) { //void to run scene c.outStream.createFrame(177); c.outStream.writeByte(i1); c.outStream.writeByte(i2); c.outStream.writeWord(i3); c.outStream.writeByte(i4); c.outStream.writeByte(i5); }

frame177(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001); //calling void

public void frame107() { //end cut scene c.outStream.createFrame(107); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } 

frame107(); //calling end cut scene void

simple.

you can change the ints in

frame177(0001, 0001, 0001, 0001, 0001); //calling void

to make the camera to different stuff
once your done use

frame107(); //calling end cut scene void to reset the camera to the original spot

Read full topic

I think there may be a packet we don’t have handled yet because we don’t know how to impliment it or know what it does.[/quote]

I hope somebody finds out soon,
I did use the camera packets.

Read full topic
